articles.title: Serie A, Inter returns to win 2-0 at San Siro against Genoa
articles.summary: Chivu's team returns to winning ways after the disappointing elimination from the Champions League, taking home three points in the championship with a victory over Genoa.

articles.summary: At its 140th annual general meeting the International Football Association Board (IFAB) approved a package of measures aimed at improving the pace of matches and reducing time wasting during play.
